title: Did Meryl Streep Applaud Roman Polanski at the Academy Awards?
subtitle: A video clip showing Meryl Streep applauding for Roman Polanski at the Academy Awards in 2003 came to the forefront after the actress' controversial 2017 Golden Globes speech.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Meryl Streep applauded for Roman Polanski at the Academy Awards in 2003.
